Use a wheelchair: If you could no longer stand up, using a wheelchair would be a great option to move around. You could get a manual or power wheelchair depending on your mobility needs and preferences.
Use a walker: A walker is another option for people who have difficulty standing up. It can help you to walk around with more stability and support.
Use crutches: Crutches can be used to support your body weight and help you to move around. You can use them as a walking aid or to help you climb stairs.
Use a cane: A cane is a great option for people who have difficulty standing up. It can help you to walk around with more stability and support.
Use a mobility scooter: A mobility scooter is a great option for people who have difficulty standing up. It can help you to move around with more ease and convenience.
